Piece

Class Bishop

  • java.lang.Object
    • Piece.Piece
      • Piece.Bishop

  • public class Bishop
extends Piece
    Represent a Bishop in a Chess game.
    Author:
    Baljit Kaur, Milan Patel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bishop

        public Bishop(java.lang.String name,
              Block block,
              java.lang.String color,
              Player player)
        Initializes a Bishop object
        Parameters:
        name - Name used to identify a Bishop
        block - The block where the Bishop is initially placed
        color - Color of the piece

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public boolean move(Block moveTo,
                    boolean check,
                    java.lang.String move)
        Determines if a move to a new block is valid. The Bishop is moved if the move is valid, else an error is returned.
        Specified by:
        move in class Piece
        Parameters:
        moveTo - The block a Bishop will be moved to if the move is valid
        check - If the move is being executed or only checked whether it results in a check.
        move - Used for pawn promotion
